comment: U.S. government geographic data including Census TIGER boundaries, HUD USPS ZIP code crosswalks, and demographic statistics. Enables spatial analysis, geographic aggregation, and crosswalk between ZIP codes, counties, census tracts, congressional districts, and metropolitan areas.

partitionedTables.name: states
partitionedTables.comment: U.S. state boundaries and attributes from TIGER/Line shapefiles. Includes state FIPS codes, names, areas, and geographic boundaries. Updated annually with official Census Bureau boundaries.

partitionedTables.name: counties
partitionedTables.comment: U.S. county boundaries and attributes including FIPS codes, names, metropolitan statistical areas, and geographic boundaries. Contains all 3,000+ counties and county equivalents.

partitionedTables.name: places
partitionedTables.comment: Census designated places including cities, towns, and villages. Contains place boundaries, population classifications, and geographic identifiers for incorporated and census-designated places.

partitionedTables.name: zctas
partitionedTables.comment: ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs) approximating USPS ZIP Code delivery areas. Includes ZCTA boundaries and relationships to other geographic entities.

partitionedTables.name: census_tracts
partitionedTables.comment: Census tract boundaries - small statistical subdivisions of counties averaging 4,000 inhabitants. Key geography for demographic analysis and census data reporting.

partitionedTables.name: block_groups
partitionedTables.comment: Census block groups - statistical divisions of census tracts, generally containing 600-3,000 people. Smallest geography for which census sample data is published.

partitionedTables.name: cbsa
partitionedTables.comment: Core Based Statistical Areas including Metropolitan and Micropolitan Statistical Areas. Defines urban cores and surrounding counties with social and economic ties.

partitionedTables.name: congressional_districts
partitionedTables.comment: U.S. Congressional district boundaries for the House of Representatives. Updated after each decennial census reapportionment and subsequent redistricting.

partitionedTables.name: school_districts
partitionedTables.comment: Elementary, secondary, and unified school district boundaries. Includes district codes, names, and relationships to other geographic entities.

partitionedTables.name: population_demographics
partitionedTables.comment: Population counts and demographic characteristics by geography from Census and American Community Survey. Includes age, sex, race, ethnicity distributions.

partitionedTables.name: housing_characteristics
partitionedTables.comment: Housing unit counts, occupancy status, tenure, and structural characteristics by geography. Source: American Community Survey 5-year estimates.

partitionedTables.name: economic_indicators
partitionedTables.comment: Income, poverty, employment, and economic characteristics by geography. Includes median household income, poverty rates, and employment statistics.

partitionedTables.name: zip_county_crosswalk
partitionedTables.comment: ZIP Code to County crosswalk file mapping ZIP codes to counties with residential and business address ratios. Source: HUD USPS ZIP Code Crosswalk.

partitionedTables.name: zip_cbsa_crosswalk
partitionedTables.comment: ZIP Code to Core Based Statistical Area crosswalk mapping ZIP codes to metropolitan and micropolitan areas.

partitionedTables.name: tract_zip_crosswalk
partitionedTables.comment: Census tract to ZIP Code crosswalk for relating census geography to postal geography. Includes residential and business address ratios.
